Class com.heaton.bot.HTMLForm

                   +----com.heaton.bot.HTMLForm
public class HTMLForm
extends AttributeList
The HTMLForm class is used to create a response to an HTML form, and then transmit it to a web server. Copyright 2001 by Jeff Heaton

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jeff Heaton

com.heaton.bot.HTMLForm. FormElement

_action
The action, or the site to post the form to.
_method
The method(i.e.

_method

The method(i.e. GET or POST)

HTMLForm 
public HTMLForm(String method,
                String action)
Construct an HTMLForm object.

Parameters:
method - The method(i.e. GET or POST)
action - The action, or the site that the result should be posted to.

addInput 
public void addInput(String name,
                     String value,
                     String type,
                     String prompt,
                     AttributeList options)
Add a HTML INPUT item to this form.

Parameters:
name - The name of the input item.
value - The value of the input item.
type - The type of input item.
